title: Mukozuke (food dish), from a set of five
description: in the form of a circle intersected with a raised square; straight walls; three feet on bottom; tan with dark brown leaf and geometric designs; light brown dots; green glaze drips; four brown dots at interior on square with pairs of dots connected by lines; thick curlicue with two wavy lines and leaf fronds at interior on circle
creditline: Gift of funds from the Friends of the Institute
